price: „Господару мој“, рећи ће, „зашто си ме слепог проживео кад сам имао вид?“
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
